doc.title: No multi-device sign on
doc.text: Today, most people have a smartphone and a tablet. So since wechat is available for both, everyone would try to sign into both so it'd be available no matter which device they decide to pick up. Sadly it currently isn't possible because for whatever reason wechat signs you off on the other device as you can only log into your account once. I think this is a fail. Why not take a page out of gtalk (hangout) and allow multi-device sign on?
